title: Luxury black & gold single-page website for Gold Laser Cutting (Etawah) with SEO + lead CTAs

requirements.summary: Build a single-page luxury black-and-gold marketing site with elegant typography and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Website uses a consistent black + gold luxury palette across all sections (backgrounds, accents, buttons, typography).
All sections are responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.
Pages/sections load without layout shift and remain performant (lazy-load non-critical images, avoid heavy assets).

file_operations.description: Create the single-page layout shell and section composition (Hero, About, Services, Gallery, Why Choose Us, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact), ensuring mobile-first structure and consistent spacing/typography.
Define the black-and-gold luxury theme using Tailwind + CSS variables (background/foreground/primary/accent), plus global typography defaults to keep styling consistent across sections.
Create a premium sticky header with brand, navigation anchors, and click-to-call access; keep styles aligned with the black/gold theme.
Create a simple luxury footer with business name/location and quick contact links matching the theme.

requirements.summary: Implement hero with exact heading/subheading and CTAs for call, WhatsApp, and scroll-to-quote.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero shows heading exactly: "Best Gold Laser Cutting Service in Etawah".
Hero shows subheading exactly: "5+ Years of Precision Jewellery Laser Cutting Experience".
Call Now button opens the device dialer via tel:7906968141.
WhatsApp Now button opens WhatsApp chat for 8126108743 (using wa.me or equivalent).
Get Quote button scrolls to the Quote/Contact section reliably.

file_operations.description: Implement the hero UI with the exact provided heading/subheading and three CTAs: tel:7906968141, WhatsApp (8126108743), and a button that scrolls to the contact/quote section. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) to ensure premium, consistent CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire HeroSection into the single-page composition and ensure the Get Quote CTA scroll target id is present on the contact/quote section.

requirements.summary: Add an English About Us section describing experience, machines, precision, finishing, and trust in Etawah.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us content is in English and includes: 5+ years experience, advanced laser machines, high precision, fine finishing, trusted in Etawah.

file_operations.description: Create an About Us section in English that explicitly mentions 5+ years experience, advanced laser machines, high precision, fine finishing, and being trusted in Etawah, styled for a luxury look.
Wire AboutSection into the single-page layout in the correct scroll order with an anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add Services section listing all seven services as premium cards or list with icons (English).
acceptanceCriteria: Services section includes all 7 services exactly as listed (English).
Services layout remains readable on mobile and does not overflow.

file_operations.description: Implement Services section showing exactly the 7 provided services, using a premium card/list layout. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for consistent luxury styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ServicesSection into the single-page layout and ensure it has an anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add Gallery section using locally stored static placeholder images with lazy-loading.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery renders a grid/carousel of at least 6 sample placeholder images.
Images are served as static frontend assets (not fetched through the backend).
Images are lazy-loaded (where applicable) to support fast loading.

file_operations.description: Create a luxury-styled gallery grid of at least 6 locally-referenced images from frontend public assets, using lazy-loading and responsive columns.
Wire GallerySection into the single-page layout and ensure it has an anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add Why Choose Us section with all six user-provided bullet points in a premium scannable layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Why Choose Us section includes all 6 points exactly as listed.
Section uses a premium, scannable layout (e.g., icon + label) and remains mobile-friendly.

file_operations.description: Implement a premium, scannable Why Choose Us layout (icon + label) containing exactly the 6 provided points, responsive on mobile.
Wire WhyChooseUsSection into the single-page layout and ensure it has an anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add Testimonials section with exactly three positive English reviews in premium cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Exactly 3 testimonial entries are shown.
Testimonials are positive, relevant to jewellery laser cutting, and written in English.

file_operations.description: Add a Testimonials section with exactly three English reviews relevant to jewellery laser cutting, using a premium card layout. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TestimonialsSection into the single-page layout and ensure it has an anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add FAQ section with four exact questions and English answers (accordion acceptable).
acceptanceCriteria: FAQ includes all 4 questions exactly as listed.
Each question has a visible answer in English (accordion or similar is acceptable).

file_operations.description: Implement an FAQ section that contains the 4 exact questions and clear English answers aligned to the business. Use shadcn-ui Accordion for accessible collapsible behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire FaqSection into the single-page layout and ensure it has an anchor id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add Contact section with business details, responsive Google Maps embed, and a Get Quote form with a usable non-email submission action.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section displays Etawah, Uttar Pradesh and both contact numbers clearly.
A Google Maps embed (iframe) is rendered and responsive on mobile.
Get Quote form is present with at least: Name, Phone, Message fields.
Submitting the form does not require external email services; it should provide a usable action (e.g., opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message to 8126108743 and/or shows a confirmation message).

file_operations.description: Create Contact section showing business name, Etawah (Uttar Pradesh), tel:7906968141, WhatsApp:8126108743, a Name/Phone/Message quote form, and a responsive Google Maps iframe embed for Etawah, Uttar Pradesh. On submit, open WhatsApp with a prefilled message and/or show an inline confirmation (no external email service). Use shadcn-ui inputs/buttons where helpful. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire ContactSection into the single-page layout; ensure it includes the scroll target id used by the Get Quote CTA.

requirements.summary: Add sticky WhatsApp button and ensure click-to-call exists in hero/header and contact section.
acceptanceCriteria: Sticky WhatsApp button is visible on mobile and desktop without obstructing core content.
Sticky WhatsApp button opens WhatsApp chat to 8126108743.
At least two click-to-call entry points exist (hero CTA and contact section) using tel:7906968141.

file_operations.description: Implement a fixed-position sticky WhatsApp button that opens WhatsApp chat for 8126108743 and is styled to match the luxury theme while avoiding obstruction of key content.
Wire StickyWhatsAppButton into the page so it remains visible across scroll; verify click-to-call links are present in hero/header and contact section.

requirements.summary: Implement on-page and technical SEO: title/meta, OG, canonical placeholder, keyword placement, and JSON-LD LocalBusiness.
acceptanceCriteria: HTML head includes a meaningful title and meta description referencing Gold Laser Cutting and Etawah.
Target keywords appear naturally in visible page copy (no keyword stuffing) and at least one H1/H2.
Open Graph tags are present for title/description (and image if available).
JSON-LD LocalBusiness (or similar) is present and includes name: Gold Laser Cutting and address locality: Etawah, region: Uttar Pradesh, country: India.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Enhance the HTML head with SEO title/meta description, Open Graph tags, a canonical URL placeholder, and JSON-LD structured data for a LocalBusiness using name 'Gold Laser Cutting' and locality Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India; reference a generated OG image if used.
Ensure at least one major heading (H1/H2) and supporting copy naturally include target local keywords (e.g., 'Gold Laser Cutting in Etawah', 'Jewellery Laser Cutting in Etawah UP') without stuffing.
Add natural keyword mentions in English within About content where appropriate while keeping premium tone and readability.

requirements.summary: Add smooth on-scroll section animations and hover transitions with reduced-motion support.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 major sections animate into view on scroll with subtle, consistent motion.
Interactive elements (buttons/cards) have smooth hover/focus transitions.
If the user prefers reduced motion, animations are minimized/disabled (prefers-reduced-motion).

file_operations.description: Create a small scroll-reveal utility hook (IntersectionObserver-based) that applies reveal state, and respects prefers-reduced-motion to minimize/disable animations.
Apply subtle entrance/hover/focus transitions using Tailwind classes and the scroll-reveal hook while respecting reduced motion.
Add consistent hover transitions for cards and scroll-reveal entrance animation (reduced-motion aware).
Add subtle reveal animation for the gallery grid and image hover/focus transitions while keeping performance and reduced-motion support.
Add reveal animation for testimonial cards on scroll and accessible focus styling.
